org.monitis.monitor.jboss7

Class ManagementClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.monitis.monitor.jboss7.ManagementClient

  • public class ManagementClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used by the JBoss7 Custom Monitor to execute management operation against JBoss 7's HTTP/JSON management interface
    Author:
    Drago Z Kamenov

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ManagementClient(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
      Instantiate the ManagementClient

        public ManagementClient(java.lang.String userName,

        Instantiate the ManagementClient

        A getter method for JBoss 7 admin username
        Returns:
        user admin username

      • setUserName

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword()
        Get the JBoss 7 admin password
        Returns:

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Sets the jboss 7 admin password
        Parameters:
        password - admin password

      • executeOp

        public JSONObject executeOp(java.lang.String urlCmd)
        Execute a management operation against the JBoss server via HTTP, and perform authentication as needed. The response is then returned to the caller
        Parameters:
        urlCmd - URL for management command, including parameters, but excluding schema, host and port number
        Returns:
        JSONObject containing the response

      • getHost

        public java.lang.String getHost()
        Gets the host name of the monitored JBoss 7 server
        Returns:
        host name

      • setHost

        public void setHost(java.lang.String host)
        Sets the hostname for the monitored JBoss 7 server
        Parameters:
        host - host name or IP address

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Gets JBoss 7 HTTP management port
        Returns:
        port number

      • setPort

        public void setPort(int port)
        Sets the JBoss 7 HTTP management port
        Parameters:
        port - port number (usually 9990)
